extensionDescription.message: An analogue clock in the toolbar!

optionsTitle.description: The title text that appears on the options page

noReminders.description: Shown when there are no reminders

exhortation.description: Text telling users that they can talk to me

webstore.message: Report a bug, feature request or ask a question on the Chrome Web Store
webstore.description: Offer to connect on the Web Store

information.message: Use this page to change the settings on the clock.
information.description: A brief description of the options page

appearanceTitle.description: The title of the appearance section

analogueTitle.description: The title of the analogue clock section

digitalTitle.description: Heading for the digital clock badge options section

showDigital.description: Label for the digital clock check box

showAnalogue.description: Label for the analogue clock check box

lblBadgePicker.description: Label for Colour Picker for badge background for the digital clock

lblBadgeA.description: Label for Transparency Picker for badge background for the digital clock

hoverTextCustom.description: Label for custom date selection button

lblMainAlarms.description: A heading label for the reminders section

lblAddNewAlarmHeading.description: Heading for the add new reminder section

lblAlarmLabel.description: Label for the label for a new reminder

lblRingLabel.description: Label for the sound dropdown for a new reminder

lblSelectedTime.description: Label for the currently selected time

lblNewAlarmHour.description: Label for the hour selector slider

lblNewAlarmMinute.description: Label for the minute selector slider

lblFirstDayoftheWeek.description: Label for the first day of the week input

repeatNewAlarm.description: Label for the repeat reminder checkbox

delete.description: Mouseover text on the delete icon for reminders

silence.description: Mouseover text on mute icon when reminder has no assigned sound

minutes.description: The word for minutes, as in 5 minutes

edit.description: The word for edit, as in edit this alarm

rdoNoDots.description: Label for traditional, no markers clock

lblCategory.description: Label for the category of a reminder

deleteCheck.description: Question to verify that the user really wants to delete a reminder

nextReminder.description: Text that goes just in front of the dat on the mouseover of the repeat icon

on.description: For example, this reminder is on this date

everyDay.description: this reminder goes off every day

every.description: this reminder goes off every Sunday

and.description: this reminder goes off every Saturday and Sunday

hourChime.description: Label for checkbox to indicate that the clock should make a noise every hour

lblOffset.description: Label for input that adds or removes time to the actual time

snoozeReminder.message: Function to snooze an alarm for five minutes
